title: Frankenstein
overview: Dr. Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant but egotistical scientist, brings a creature to life in a monstrous experiment that ultimately leads to the undoing of both the creator and his tragic creation.

title: Predator: Badlands
overview: Cast out from his clan, a young Predator finds an unlikely ally in a damaged android and embarks on a treacherous journey in search of the ultimate adversary.

title: Black Phone 2
overview: Four years after escaping The Grabber, Finney Blake is struggling with his life after captivity. When his sister Gwen begins receiving calls in her dreams from the black phone and seeing disturbing visions of three boys being stalked at a winter camp, the siblings become determined to solve the mystery and confront a killer who has grown more powerful.

title: End of Loyalty
overview: When the head of a notorious crime family is murdered, his son Grant is hell bent on payback and the only person that can stop him from tearing the city apart and destroying himself in the process is his best friend and federal agent, Ray Rose.

title: War of the Worlds
overview: Will Radford is a top analyst for Homeland Security who tracks potential threats through a mass surveillance program, until one day an attack by an unknown entity leads him to question whether the government is hiding something from him and from the rest of the world.

title: Playdate
overview: When out-of-work accountant Brian joins stay-at-home dad Jeff for a playdate with their sons, he expects a laid-back afternoon. Instead, they're chased by mercenaries, and Brian must survive one absurd obstacle after another.

title: Abyss
overview: 11 years ago, inspector Malik couldn't solve a kidnapping case and a little girl died. Now with only a few days before the crime gets classified, he decides to reopen the case.

title: Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc
overview: In a brutal war between devils, hunters, and secret enemies, a mysterious girl named Reze has stepped into Denji's world, and he faces his deadliest battle yet.

title: Baramulla
overview: A cop's inquiry into child kidnappings unravels chilling secrets as supernatural events endanger his family and the peaceful town of Baramulla.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle
overview: The Demon Slayer Corps are drawn into the Infinity Castle, where Tanjiro and the Hashira face terrifying Upper Rank demons.

title: xXx
overview: Xander Cage is an adrenaline junkie who gets recruited by the government to infiltrate a criminal organization.

title: Captain Hook: The Cursed Tides
overview: After a devastating defeat, Captain Hook finds refuge in a coastal town while darkness rises again.

title: Afterburn
overview: A group of treasure hunters travel across a postapocalyptic world recovering historic artifacts.

title: The Fantastic 4: First Steps
overview: Marvel's First Family must defend Earth from Galactus in a retro-futuristic world.

title: Hunting Grounds
overview: Chloe runs away from her mafia-tied husband, but her new refuge hides a dangerous secret.

title: Martin
overview: Arjun Saxena travels across borders searching for his true identity while fighting organized crime.

title: KPop Demon Hunters
overview: K-pop superstars secretly hunt supernatural threats while balancing fame and danger.

title: titanic
overview: film directed by James Cameron that blends a fictional love story with the real-life tragedy of the RMS Titanic's maiden voyage in 1912. The narrative is framed by a modern-day story where an elderly survivor recounts her experience.
